block.create_connected.fan_freezing_cata: Dedicated _bulk freezing_ device for Create: Dreams and Desires, requires industrial fan. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_seething_cata: Dedicated _bulk superheating_ device for Create: Dreams and Desires, requires industrial fan. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_sanding_catal: Dedicated _bulk sanding_ device for Create: Dreams and Desires, requires industrial fan. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
